cms.query.QueryText:
SELECT PermissionName FROM CMS_Permission WHERE PermissionID IN (SELECT Media_LibraryRolePermission.PermissionID FROM Media_LibraryRolePermission WHERE LibraryID = @LibraryID AND RoleID IN ( SELECT RoleID FROM View_CMS_UserRoleMembershipRole WHERE UserID=@UserID AND (ValidTo > @ValidTo OR ValidTo IS NULL)
)) AND PermissionName = @PermissionName
